items.title: Basic App Framework
items.description: Develop a mobile application framework that can be extended with features for farmers.
acceptance_criteria: User can install the app on Android and iOS devices
App launches successfully and displays a welcome screen
Navigation menu is present with placeholder sections for future features
non_functional: App must load initial screen within 3 seconds

notes: User requirement is vague; assumed initial need is to create a basic mobile app framework for farmers that can later be expanded with specific features such as weather updates, crop management, and market prices.
